YouTube Live LioranBoard

YouTube Live is an upcoming extension for LioranBoard, which will provide our users the ability to schedule a broadcast and go live directly from LioranBoard. It will be also able to listen YouTube chat and super chat events, send and manage chat messages and more.

As of now the extension is in the testing phase, waiting for an approval by YouTube. Its access is limited to our beta testers, until we are confident we can release a stable version for everyone else to use.

By using our extension, you're allowing it to access and modify your Youtube account (i.e. schedule broadcasts, listen to YouTube chat events, send and delete YouTube chat messages). This is all done locally on your computer and is never shared with any third parties.

You can revoke the extension's access to your YouTube account at any time by following this link.
